name: Pacidman [1 Level - Prototype]
description:
Gameplay 

A super fast paced first person version of Pacman.  Can you collect all the glowing pellets' before you run out of lives? 

Controls

  1. In First person view mode WSAD - Movement and Mouse to look left and right
  2. In Top down view mode, WSAD and Mouse to turn

Make this into a full game?

Would you all be interested in this becoming a full fledged game. Or have some suggestions? Let me know in the comments!
